title: Discord Pops Up In-Game
body:
Everything has been working fine. I turned on my computer today and a small Discord window pops up in-game. It won't allow me to click on it, I tried clicking on it to click the gear/settings button, or at least move it out of the way, but it's no use. I removed League Of Legends from my Discord, and it still pops up on League. And it's only in-game.

It is very frustrating because it blocks out a huge chunk of the screen and I can't get it to go away. Hopefully someone can help me or at least knows what is going on. I'd like to fix this problem asap.

replies.body: Yeah, Discord has some overlays that can cause issues with the client.  Previously, it was crashing players trying to login.  ><  You'll want to go to your Discord settings and disable overlays or uninstall the app.  I hope that helps!
